start.text: Give up now, and I'll guarantee you'll breathe.
More victim- I mean, volunteers for my experiments! *laughter*
So many defences, captain, and all USELESS!
Now, make your stand against me, doctor Thrax, and once your forces have breathed their last breath, I can return to my experiments.

start_boss.text: You'll come for the toxins, but you'll stay... because you're dead! *laughter*
Now, it is just you and me, captain.
Watch out, captain. This ship might not be safe, but then, what is around here, huh? *laughter*
It's so hard to find a doctor these days who will make house calls! Ah, but doctor Thrax still does! Ahahahahhhaha!

retreat.text: Maybe you'll consider a peace offering, huh? An antidote, perhaps?
Ehh, perhaps I shouldn't have gotten my degree from a mail order college.
Aw, what do you have against toxins? Have you seen what they put in the food these days?

out_of_missiles.text: Have a taste of my own medicine!
Oh, it is not so bad. You should only feel a long and painful burning after this.

engaged.text: One taste and you'll never go back, even if you wanted to!
Are you going to attack me, or are you afraid of what you're going to find at my base, huh?
Eee! My brave crew! How can you do this to them? What did they ever do to- oh, oh wait, nevermind.

need_help.text: You'll regret intruding on my experiments, captain.
Did I give you the permission to come in?
What are you doing in here? The recipes are mine!
You are a fool to come to me, captain.

pursuing.text: Ohhh, you're going to like this, captain! O, no wait, no, you won't! *laughter*
Every moment you delay, you die a little bit more!
Ah, you didn't really need that, anyway. *laughter*
My toxins and your troops certainly have a chemistry, eh?
You are out of flux, captain. Now it is time for me to come and play. *laughter*

running.text: Every moment you delay, you die a little bit more.
I'll give you a breather, before my next attack.

hull_90.text: Geh! My precious chemicals! Do you know how long it takes to mix those?

hull_50.text: Hey! I had my wine collection in there!
Stop destroying my ship, captain, or I will make things unpleasant for you.

hull_30.text: Ah, you destroyed my bridge! Oh well, I never liked my commanders anyway!
Ah! Get away from me! You will not defeat me, captain, do you hear me?

overload.text: Er, captain, we have a clogged nozzle. Give me a second to fix it.
Flux? I don't want to hear about the flux!

death.text: No, no! I am defeated! Now, where is that cyanide capsule...
Perhaps I inhaled too many of my own toxins. You can't possibly be defeating me!

victory.text: Would you like the green, or the blue? Both are equally satisfying. *laughter*
Ohh, you thought my toxins were ineffective. Now look what happened to you, captain!
See, you can tell when they're *mwah* just right, when the flesh falls off the bone!
You are defeated, captain. Perhaps this will teach you to defy doctor Thrax! *laughter*
